Methods.Name: List Transactions
Methods.Description: Outputs a list of all Transaction Objects that currently exist in your SaaSOptics account.

Methods.Name: List Contracts
Methods.Description: Outputs a list of all Contract Objects that currently exist in your SaaSOptics account.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Contract Analytics
Methods.Description: Shows some calculated fields for a Contract instance.

Methods.Name: Update Contract (Partial)
Methods.Description: Modify some fields on a Contract instance based on data provided in a JSON payload.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Contract
Methods.Description: Outputs detailed field information for a specific Contract Object.
